newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close mixed in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close mixed in continuous trade.

text.p: Ten stocks fell, two rose and seven were flat in 16.8-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Thursday.
The remaining four stocks did not trade.
NFI units rose 0.7 percent to 142.5 zlotys in a 7.7-million-zloty turnover.
Compared to their main market fixing 14 stocks rose, three fell and two were flat, with the WIG 20 index closing 0.4 percent higher than at 1,623.9 points.
